scripts.redeps: : Clear everything, then refill to satisfy all dependencies                    ; npm run reset && npm run deps
scripts.rebuild: : Clear everything, then build from scratch                                    ; npm run reset && npm run deps && npm run build
scripts.s3Synch: npm run buildDev && aws s3 sync ./dist s3://daln-development/web-deploy
scripts.s3Prod: npm run buildProd && aws s3 sync ./dist s3://daln-prod/web-deploy
scripts.clean: : Removes temporary build results, not including dependencies                  ; rm -rf dist
scripts.gut: : Removes all temporary files, including dependencies                          ; npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules plugins resources && echo "***** Dependencies have been removed, they can be restored with: npm run deps"
scripts.reset: : Unlock dependency versions, clear NPM cache, remove temp files               ; npm run gut && rm -f ./package-lock.json >>/dev/null 2>&1 && npm cache clear --force && ./add-nl.sh package.json && echo "***** Dependencies have been removed and reset, they can be restored with: npm run deps"
scripts.globals: : Do nothing, jenkins runs globals at the start
